ClsC_181b552b.class_description: Core narrative elements of the Hook Man urban legend, including the fugitive criminal and his distinctive hook hand.
ClsC_181b552b.evidence_excerpt: a news report about an escaped criminal with a hook for a hand

members.entity_description: A fugitive offender described in the news report, central to the Hook Man legend.
members.resolution_context: they hear a news report about an escaped criminal with a hook for a hand.

members.entity_description: A metal hook replacing the criminalâ€™s hand, a defining feature of the Hook Man.

ClsC_a4e5a4f4.class_description: Historical and modern eras referenced to contextualize the development and spread of urban legends, from ancient storytelling to the internet and social media age.
ClsC_a4e5a4f4.evidence_excerpt: The spread of urban legends has been facilitated in the age of the internet... traced back to ancient times when stories were used to explain the unknown.

members.entity_name: age of the internet and social media
members.entity_description: Modern era characterized by pervasive internet access and widespread social media platforms.
members.resolution_context: The spread of urban legends has been greatly facilitated by advancements in technology and communication. In the age of the internet and social media, stories can be shared and disseminated at lightning speed, reaching a global audience in a matter of seconds.

members.entity_description: Historical period referenced as the origin era for explanatory stories and legends.
members.resolution_context: The origins of urban legends can be traced back to ancient times when stories were used to explain the unknown and the supernatural.
